sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , G.GIS_ASSETS_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN , G.GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI , G.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD , G.GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE , TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT , G.GIS_ASSETS_RM , G.REG_USR , TO_CHAR(G.REGISTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGISTDT , G.UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(G.UPDTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDTDT , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD , G.GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , G.DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR , G.DRW_LST_SEQ , G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT , TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT , G.ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD , G.ERP_ASSETS_NO , G.ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ , G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN , G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD , B.USAGE_AR , B.FEE , B.RDCXPT_FEE , CASE WHEN NVL(B.USAGE_AR,0) > 0 AND NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0) > 0 THEN (NVL(B.USAGE_AR,0) / NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0)) ELSE 0 END USAGE_RATIO , TO_CHAR(B.USAGE_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USAGE_PD_FROM , TO_CHAR(B.USAGE_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USAGE_PD_TO , A.PRT_AT_CODE , A.MNG_YEAR || '-' || A.MNG_NO || '-' || A.MNG_CNT AS RENT_MNG_NO , (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CD.CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND ROWNUM = 1) PRT_AT_CODE_NM , A.ENTRPSCD , ( SELECT E.ENTRPS_NM FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F E WHERE E.ENTRPSCD = A.ENTRPSCD AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ENTRPS_NM , NVL(A.GR_FEE,0) GR_FEE , NVL(A.GR_RDCXPT_FEE,0) GR_RDCXPT_FEE , B.USAGE_PRPOS_CD , B.USAGE_PURPS , (G.GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) ASSETS_CD_STR , (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'GAM001' AND CD.CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD_NM , (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'GAM002' AND CD.CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD_NM , (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'GAM003' AND CD.CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD_NM , (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'GAM007' AND CD.CODE = B.USAGE_PRPOS_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) USAGE_PRPOS_CD_NM FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A , ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B , GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT AND B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #sGisAssetsCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #sGisAssetsSubCd#
AND B.QUAY_CD = #sQuayCd#
AND A.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND A.PRMISN_YN = #sPrmisnYn#
AND A.DEPTCD = #deptcd#
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM <= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
ORDER BY G.REGISTDT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A , ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B , GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT AND B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #sGisAssetsCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #sGisAssetsSubCd#
AND B.QUAY_CD = #sQuayCd#
AND A.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND A.PRMISN_YN = #sPrmisnYn#
AND A.DEPTCD = #deptcd#
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM <= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_CNT , TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(B.USAGE_AR),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_AR , TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(B.FEE),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_FEE , TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_RDCXPT_FEE FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A , ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B , GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT AND B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #sGisAssetsCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #sGisAssetsSubCd#
AND B.QUAY_CD = #sQuayCd#
AND A.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND A.PRMISN_YN = #sPrmisnYn#
AND A.DEPTCD = #deptcd#
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND A.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM <= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
